alert.note: Alert for Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 9:59PM CDT until August 02 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in east central Missouri... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Miramiguoa Park to Anthonies Mill to 7 miles southeast of Bourbon, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Potosi, Anthonies Mill, Irondale, Mineral Point, Old Mines, Richwoods, Courtois, Caledonia, Belgrade, Latty, Cadet, and Shirley. This also includes Washington State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
